ARABIC: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأَقْعُدَنَّ لَهُمْ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'By Your misguidance of me, I will lie in ambush for them on your straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Since You led me into error," said Iblis, "I shall lie in wait for them along Your straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Satan said: 'Since You have led me astray, I shall surely sit in ambush for them on Your Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then Satan said, "Because you have made me go astray, I shall certainly try to seduce people into straying from the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Hence I swear by the fact that You sent me astray, I will certainly lay in wait for them on Your Straight Path.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Iblis) said: "Because You have `Aghwaytni', surely, I will sit in wait against them (human beings) on Your straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: As Thou hast caused me to remain disappointed I will certainly lie in wait for them in Thy straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Now, for Thy perverting me, I shall surely sit in ambush for them on Thy straight path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Now, because Thou hast sent me astray, verily I shall lurk in ambush for them on Thy Right Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then Satan said, "Because You have put me in the wrong, I will lie in ambush for them on Your straight path:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: because Thou hast seduced me, I will beset for them Thy straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘As You have consigned me to perversity,’ he said, ‘I will surely lie in wait for them on Your straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Because thou hast thrown me out of the way, lo! I will lie in wait for them on thy straight way:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Iblis) said: "Because You have sent me astray, surely I will sit in wait against them (human beings) on Your Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: he answered: 'Because You have caused me to go astray, I will waylay them as they walk on Your Straight Path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Because you have lured me, I will waylay them on Your straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Satan] said, "Because You have put me in error, I will surely sit in wait for them on Your straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:16]   Said he, ‘Now, because You have sent me astray (fa-bi-mā aghwaytanī means bi-ighwā’ik, ‘for Your sending me astray’: the bā’ is for oaths, and the response of the oath is [the following]) verily I shall sit in ambush for them, that is, for the Children of Adam, on Your straight path, that is, on the path that leads to You.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He) Iblis (said: Now, because Thou hast sent me astray) just as You made me err from guidance, (verily I shall lurk in ambush for them) for the children of Adam (on Thy Right Path) the religion of Islam.
